slide1.title: Structural Advantage of a Small Fund
slide1.description: The fund’s size enables faster execution, targeted deal access, and active oversight — benefits not typically available to larger institutional vehicles.

slide2.title: Regulated and Globally Positioned
slide2.description: Vertex FinCapital operates under the Singapore VCC framework and is managed by MAS-licensed XEQ Capital, providing legal clarity, investor protection, and international credibility.

slide3.title: Aligned Profit Distribution Model
slide3.description: Investors receive the first 12% p.a. of returns. Only after this threshold is met does the fund share in profits, ensuring investor-first economics at the structural level

slide4.title: Fee Discipline and Alignment
slide4.description: The fund applies a flat 2% management fee (covering all operating expenses) and performance fees only apply above a 12% return, ensuring investor-aligned incentives.

slide5.title: Selective Participation
slide5.description: The investor base is intentionally capped at 20–30 parties to preserve deal quality and access discipline.

homeHero.title:
Leverage Unique Opportunities.
Create Value. Deliver Results.
homeHero.description:
Regulated in Singapore. Open-ended structure.
Multi-asset strategy.

homeLast.title: Investor Access & Inquiry
homeLast.description: Vertex FinCapital works exclusively with accredited investors. To request documentation or discuss participation, please submit the form below. All submissions are reviewed individually by the fund’s management team.

slide1.title: Vertex FinCapital is a MAS-regulated investment fund structured under Singapore’s XEQ Global Alternatives VCC.
slide1.text1: The fund offers accredited investors access to private market opportunities across real estate, private equity, credit, venture capital, and public equities.
slide1.text2: Combining institutional governance with boutique agility, the fund serves as a core alternative allocation for sophisticated portfolios.

slide2.title:
Our key
investment focus
slide2.text1: Real estate (equity or structured debt in development-stage projects)
slide2.text2: Private equity (payments, proptech, scalable B2B platforms)
slide2.text3: Secured private credit (with collateral and oversight)
slide2.text4: Public small-cap equities (value-oriented with near-term catalysts)

contactWrap.title: Contact Us
contactWrap.subtitle1Description: Our team is available to respond to fund-related inquiries and direct requests. Please use the contact details below to connect with us.
contactWrap.subtitle2Description: For direct inquiries or follow-up requests, please complete the form below and our team will respond promptly.
contactWrap.subtitle3:
Let your capital do what it
was meant to — create value.

item1.title:
Capital Deployment
Strategy
item1.description: Vertex FinCapital applies a structured approach to private market investments, allocating funds across real estate, private equity, credit, and venture opportunities. Each investment is selected based on rigorous evaluation, focusing on value creation and long-term returns.

item2.title:
Interim Fund
Management
item2.description: Pending private market transactions, unallocated capital is strategically placed in listed securities. This ensures liquidity maintenance while minimizing cash drag, allowing productive deployment even during transitional phases.

item3.title:
Investment
Oversight
item3.description: A senior investment manager directly oversees interim portfolio positions through a dedicated brokerage account. The focus remains on selecting high-quality equities and bonds, ensuring consistent performance and risk-adjusted returns.

exploreFund.title1:
Learn how Vertex FinCapital operates
within a regulated framework:
exploreFund.title: Explore the Fund Further

item1.title: Singapore & Southeast Asia
item1.description: Tech innovation, real estate growth corridors, and early-stage fintech opportunities.

item2.title: Israel
item2.description: Cybersecurity, B2B SaaS platforms, and digital payment solutions.

item3.title: Europe (incl. UK)
item3.description: Proptech, stable private credit markets, and real estate development.

item4.title: North America
item4.description: Growth equity investments and pre-IPO venture capital participation.

item5.title: UAE/Dubai
item5.description: Hospitality and logistics-linked real estate, plus high-yield credit opportunities.

geographicDiversification.title: Geographic Diversification
geographicDiversification.note5: FX exposure, and capital controls, ensuring stability and governance.

investmentStrategyHero.title: Investment Strategy
investmentStrategyHero.description: Targeted Allocation. Disciplined Structure. Active Oversight.

item1.title: Structured Security
item1.description: Secured lending and senior debt structures minimize downside risk and enhance capital protection.

item2.title: Diversified Exposure
item2.description: Investments span multiple sectors and jurisdictions, reducing concentration risk.

item3.title: Conservative Valuations
item3.description: Each asset undergoes peer benchmarking and strict valuation controls to ensure pricing discipline.

item4.title: Dynamic Portfolio Oversight
item4.description: Quarterly rebalancing ensures adaptability, with no more than 50% of NAV allocated to any single asset class.

strategicFlexibility.title: Strategic Flexibility
strategicFlexibility.item1: When private deal flow is pending, available funds are temporarily allocated to
strategicFlexibility.item3: This ensures productivity and prevents idle capital while maintaining a balanced portfolio.

strategyInclude.title: Include
strategyInclude.item2: Capital may be temporarily allocated to listed securities while private deals are in process
strategyInclude.item3: Managed through a dedicated brokerage account by a senior investment manager
strategyInclude.item4: Focus on value-based equity and bond positions to avoid cash drag

item1.title:
Real
Estate
item1.text: Investments in pre-completion residential, commercial, or mixed-use projects. Focus on permits, strong sponsors, and clear exit strategies.

item2.title:
Private
Equity
item2.text: Expansion-stage investments in scalable businesses—payments, proptech, and asset-light real estate platforms.

item3.title:
Private
Credit
item3.text: Secured lending to mid-market firms. Yield range 8–20% p.a., backed by property, receivables, or guarantees. Includes board rights and oversight.

item4.title:
Venture
Capital
item4.text: Early-stage exposure in fintech, proptech, and data infrastructure startups. Selective investments with high-growth potential.

item5.title:
Small-Cap
Equities
item5.text: Opportunistic positions in listed or pre-IPO firms showing undervaluation and near-term catalysts.

targetPortfolio.title: Portfolio Allocation & Asset Classes
targetPortfolio.note2: Adjustments occur quarterly or as needed, ensuring no single asset class exceeds 50% of NAV.

investorAccess.title: Investor Access & Inquiry
investorAccess.description: Vertex FinCapital works exclusively with accredited investors. To request documentation or discuss participation, please submit the form below. All submissions are reviewed individually by the fund’s management team.

investorHero.title: Investor Information
investorHero.description: Eligibility Criteria. Subscription Process. Transparent Reporting.

item2.title:
Redemption
Window
item2.text: Redemptions are allowed once per calendar year, during the year-end window.

item3.title:
Notice
Requirement
item3.text: A 60-day written notice is required prior to redemption.

item4.title:
Secondary
Transfers
item4.text: Allowed with KYC approval, offering mid-term liquidity without NAV impact.

liquidityRedemption.title: Liquidity & Redemption Terms
liquidityRedemption.text:
Vertex FinCapital is structured as an open-ended, evergreen fund with defined
redemption parameters to support long-term capital alignment.

item1.title: Biannual NAV Reports
item1.text: Sent in June and December with portfolio valuation and performance.

item2.title: Audited Annual Reports
item2.text: Released after fiscal year-end, prepared by Baker Tilly.

item3.title: Event-Based Updates
item3.text: Provided for significant developments like new investments or exits.

item4.title: Direct Investor Access
item4.text: No portals. All updates and inquiries are handled personally via email, phone, or WhatsApp.

reportingCommunication.title: Reporting & Communication
reportingCommunication.text: Vertex FinCapital ensures full transparency through direct, periodic, and event-driven communication.

item1.title: Contact Us
item1.text: Start by contacting our team to express your interest in participating. You can reach us via phone, email, or the request form on this website.

item2.title: Receive Fund Documents
item2.text: Once your request is received, we will send you the Private Placement Memorandum (PPM), subscription forms, and all relevant legal documentation.

item3.title: Complete KYC/AML
item3.text: To proceed, you’ll need to submit identity verification documents and complete the required KYC and AML forms. This is a standard regulatory step.

item4.title: Sign the Subscription Agreement
item4.text: After compliance approval, you will sign the Subscription Agreement and any additional forms needed to confirm your commitment.

item5.title: Transfer Capital
item5.text: Wire your investment amount to the fund’s custodial account held with DBS Bank Ltd. Full instructions will be provided.

item6.title: Receive Confirmation
item6.text: Upon successful receipt and processing, you will receive official confirmation of your allocation and onboarding into the fund.

subscriptionProcess.title: Subscription Process
subscriptionProcess.text:
If you wish to join Vertex FinCapital, follow the steps below. Each stage ensures
compliance, transparency, and a smooth onboarding experience.

item1.title: Accreditation Status
item1.text: Must qualify as an accredited investor under MAS guidelines.

item2.title: Limited Capacity
item2.text: Participation is limited to up to 30 qualified investors.

whoCanInvest.title: Who Can Invest
whoCanInvest.text:
Vertex FinCapital is open to a limited number of qualified participants. We welcome
accredited investors who meet the following conditions:

cta.title: Ready to Join Vertex FinCapital?
cta.text: If you meet the eligibility criteria and want to explore participation, our team can guide you through the next steps. Whether you have a question or are ready to move forward, we support your process.

item1.title: Regulated Environment
item1.text: Licensed and supervised under the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS), ensuring compliance with KYC, AML, and reporting standards.

item2.title: VCC Sub-Fund Structure
item2.text: Structured as an open-ended sub-fund within the Variable Capital Company framework. Assets are ring-fenced and legally segregated from other sub-funds.

item3.title: Advanced Financial Infrastructure
item3.text: Operates in one of the world’s leading financial jurisdictions, with streamlined fund registration and institutional-grade service providers.

item4.title: Tax Efficiency
item4.text: Eligible for fund-specific tax exemptions, no capital gains tax in Singapore, and access to a broad network of Double Taxation Agreements (DTAs).

fundJurisdiction.title: Fund Jurisdiction & Legal Framework
fundJurisdiction.text: Vertex FinCapital operates under a Singapore-regulated legal structure designed to meet the highest institutional standards. The fund is structured as a sub-fund of XEQ Global Alternatives VCC and benefits from the following key features:

legalHero.title: Legal and Compliance
legalHero.description: Transparent structure. Independent oversight. Regulated under Singapore law.

item1.title: Auditing and Tax Compliance
item1.description: Vertex FinCapital maintains full financial transparency through independent audits and expert tax advisory, aligned with Singapore’s regulatory framework.

block1.title: Baker Tilly TFW LLP
block1.description: A leading audit firm responsible for the fund’s annual audits in accordance with Singapore Financial Reporting Standards (SFRS).

item2.text: Confirms fund expenses and asset valuations

block2.title: Baker Tilly & Consultancy
block2.description: Provides ongoing tax guidance to optimise fund structure and ensure legal compliance.

item1.text: Designs tax-efficient structures under Singapore’s fund regime

item2.text: Supports participation in tax exemption schemes

item3.text: Ensures access to Double Taxation Agreement (DTA) benefits for eligible investors

item2.title: Legal Counsel & Documentation
item2.description: Legal operations and governance oversight are provided by a specialist legal partner with deep fund expertise.

block1.title: BTPLaw LLC
block1.description: A Singapore-based law firm advising on fund structuring, registration, and compliance.

item1.text: Drafts and reviews offering documents, subscription agreements, and other legal materials

item2.text: Manages regulatory filings with relevant authorities

item3.text: Provides ongoing legal guidance throughout the fund’s operations and lifecycle

item3.title: Custodianship and Asset Protection
item3.description: The fund’s financial assets are held and monitored by a top-tier custodian under institutional-grade protocols.

block1.title: DBS Bank Ltd
block1.description: One of Asia’s leading banks, entrusted with the safekeeping and flow of fund capital.

item1.text: Maintains dedicated custodial accounts for investor protection

item2.text: Safeguards the fund’s cash positions and listed securities

item3.text: Oversees settlement monitoring and day-to-day transaction flows

item4.title: Corporate Governance
item4.description: Strong internal governance is maintained through ongoing statutory oversight and corporate recordkeeping.

block1.title: Atriox Management
block1.description: A specialized corporate service provider ensuring structural and legal integrity of the fund entity.

item1.text: Manages statutory compliance with Singapore’s ACRA

item2.text: Maintains up-to-date director and shareholder registries

item3.text: Oversees internal governance and documentation protocols

item1.title: Licensed Fund Manager
item1.text: XEQ Capital is authorised to manage capital markets products and serve accredited investors, operating within MAS’s regulatory framework.

item2.title: MAS Compliance
item2.text: All fund activities are conducted in accordance with Singapore’s regulatory requirements, ensuring transparency and institutional integrity
item2.text2: Timely statutory filings and disclosure obligations
item2.text3: Robust governance, risk oversight, and fund operation protocols

item3.title: Core Regulatory Functions
item3.text1: Full KYC/AML compliance under MAS guidelines

regulatoryOversight.title: Regulatory Oversight
regulatoryOversight.text: Vertex FinCapital is managed by XEQ Capital, a licensed fund manager regulated by the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) under CMS License No. CMS101602. The fund’s operations adhere to the highest regulatory and institutional standards.

item1.text: Ring-fenced sub-funds – Each compartment is legally separate, isolating liabilities

item2.text: Streamlined approvals – Fast-track fund registration and compliance under MAS

item3.text: Tax efficiency – No capital gains tax and access to Singapore’s tax exemption schemes

item4.text: Global trust – Singapore law supports international dispute resolution and investor confidence

whySingapore.title: Why Singapore VCC Matters
whySingapore.text: Vertex FinCapital is structured under the Variable Capital Company (VCC) regime—Singapore’s gold-standard framework for modern funds.
whySingapore.subtitle: Legal and Operational Advantages

cta.title: Ready to Join Vertex FinCapital?
cta.text: Participation is exclusive—and deliberate. If you meet the investor criteria and are looking to diversify with institutional-grade private market exposure, we invite you to start the conversation.

cta.title: If you are interested in investments and our fund, please visit the Fund page or contact us directly.

posts.title1: Global Financing Reform in Focus: Why FfD4 in Seville Matters
posts.description1: The upcoming UN conference in Seville marks a pivotal moment for reshaping the global financial architecture. As debt pressures rise and sustainable development goals remain underfunded, FfD4 brings critical momentum to reform efforts—and signals where global capital may shift next
posts.title2: Europe’s Investment Landscape: Innovation and Fragmentation
posts.description2: Europe stands at a crossroads—rich in technology and green leadership, yet constrained by fragmented markets and tightening fiscal pressures. This analysis explores where capital is flowing, what’s holding it back, and why bold investment reform is urgently needed.
posts.title3: Vertex FinCapital on the 9th Annual European Fund Finance Symposium
posts.description3: As Europe’s fund finance ecosystem evolves, the 9th Annual Symposium in London becomes a critical touchpoint for private capital professionals. Vertex FinCapital highlights why this year’s discussions on structuring, liquidity, and regulatory shifts are particularly relevant for fund managers and institutional investors.
posts.description4: The upcoming forum in Amsterdam gathers Europe’s top LPs and GPs to examine how capital allocation is evolving across biotech, tech, and climate ventures. Vertex FinCapital outlines why this event is pivotal for shaping the continent’s innovation finance landscape.

newsHero.title: Insights & Analysis
newsHero.description: Expert views on markets, capital, and innovation.

servicePartners.title: Our Service Partners
servicePartners.description: Vertex FinCapital works with a select group of established service providers, each fulfilling a critical role in the fund’s legal, operational, and regulatory infrastructure. From administration and custody to audit, compliance, and tax advisory, these partners ensure that every aspect of the fund operates with institutional precision and transparency.

serviceProvidersHero.title: Service Providers
serviceProvidersHero.description: Specialist Institutions. Independent Oversight. Institutional-Grade Operations.

fundHero.title: Vertex FinCapital
fundHero.description: Singapore-domiciled. Institutionally managed. Focused on results.

fundPositioning.title: Fund Positioning & Objectives
fundPositioning.description: Vertex FinCapital serves as a core alternative allocation for accredited investors, combining boutique agility with institutional standards. The fund is limited to 20–30 participants and follows a high-conviction, access-driven strategy focused on private market opportunities.

item1.title:
Fund
Structure
item1.description: Vertex is a Singapore-domiciled, open-ended fund, which is managed by XEQ Capital Pte., a Singapore-registered fund manager.

item2.title:
Regulatory
Status
item2.description: The fund is licensed and regulated by the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS).

item3.title:
Management &
Framework
item3.description: Managed by XEQ Capital, promoted by YB Advisors. VCC structure provides asset protection, tax efficiency, and governance.

keyFeatures.title1: Performance fees apply only after a 12% return
keyFeatures.title2: Direct contact — no portals or intermediaries.
keyFeatures.title3: Fast execution with active deal oversight.
keyFeatures.title: Key Features / Differentiators

teamRepresentatives.text1_1: Represents XEQ Capital. Specializes in multi-asset portfolio design and macroeconomic research.
teamRepresentatives.text1_2: Experienced at AIA, Phillip Capital, and Prudential. Brings disciplined execution and conservative capital allocation expertise.
teamRepresentatives.text2_1: Represents YB Advisors. CPA (Israel) with 15+ years in cross-border fund structuring, tax strategy, and investor relations.
teamRepresentatives.text2_2: Active across Europe and Israel, with strong integration of digital finance systems.
teamRepresentatives.title: Team Representatives

contactForm.messageSentDescription: Thank you for your message. A representative of Vertex FinCapital will contact you shortly.
